packager.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a company that puts together products, information, or other services and prepares them so they can be sold together
packager.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Credit-card issuers are major packagers of financial information, often telling merchants how much customers spend in their stores, and how often they shop there.
packager.translation[0].definitions[2].d: a financial institution that puts together and sells investments offered by other companies and financial institutions

packager.translation[0].definitions[3].d: a financial institution that packages loans it has bought from lenders and sells them as bonds
